parameters.definition: Maximum proportion of vehicles that can be rickshaws
Minimum number of visitors to be transported

description: A theme park transports its visitors around the park either by scooter or rickshaw. A scooter can carry \param{ScooterCapacity} people while a rickshaw can carry \param{RickshawCapacity} people. To avoid excessive pollution, at most \param{MaxRickshawProportion} of the vehicles used can be rickshaws. If the park needs to transport at least \param{MinVisitors} visitors, minimize the total number of scooters used.
